content:
Let's ditch Google Analytics (and their closed-source, privacy-nightmare tracking) and switch to open-source and privacy-friendly software instead: https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org/issues/783

Switch to open-source and more privacy-friendly analytics tool 路 Issue #783 路 backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org
Google Analytics is a proprietary, privacy-adverse tool for tracking visitor information on your website. We currently use it on BackdropCMS.org. Being the privacy and open-souce advocate I am, I&#...
